column2: select count(*) as COUNT_RECEIPT from PMDB..PM_RECEIPT T inner join PMDB..PM_JOB_ORDER O on (T.RECEIPT_DATE = O.DATA_DATE_FR) inner join PMDB..PM_PAYMENT_CATEGORY CT on (T.CATEGORY_CODE = CT.CATEGORY_CODE) inner join PMDB..PM_BUSINESS_OF_PAYMENT BOP on (T.BOP_ID = BOP.BOP_ID) where BOP.BOP_CODE = 'P' and  CT.CATEGORY_ABBR = 'PP' and O.ORDER_ID = @order_id
